CMS_Deep_Learning package¶

Contents¶

CMS_Deep_Learning is a set of Python libraries that assist the workflow of doing deep learning with keras, especially with high engergy physics datasets. CMS_Deep_Learning contains packages for:

  • Data Preprocessing
  • Dataset Generator Creation
  • IO simplification
  • Custom Layers
  • Data Bookkeeping
  • Plot Creation

Examples¶

  • Postprocessing Example
  • IO Example

    • Single File IO
    • Simplified IO
    • Generators
    • Efficient Size Finding
    • Stiching Together Multifile Datasets
    • Reshape Utilities
  • CMS_Deep_Learning.preprocessing
    • pandas_to_numpy
  • CMS_Deep_Learning.layers
    • lorentz layer
    • slice layer
  • CMS_Deep_Learning.storage
    • MPIArchiving
    • archiving
